mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Anna Cora Ritchie, 1859 June 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Anna Cora Ritchie, Vice Regent for Virginia, June 2, 1859. Miss Cunningham describes how she wants to accumulate almost all the remaining funds owed toward the purchase of Mount Vernon before making another payment to John Augustine Washington III. Hopes the Vice Regents will take advantage of the upcoming July 4th holiday to raise funds.
